question: In the Quran it says that the hour of the last day will only start when the Jews and Muslims start fighting and when one Jew will go behind a rock and the rock will speak and say kill the Jew.
answer:
QUESTION
But the jews and Muslims have fought so many times so does this mean the hour of the last day has already started?
ANSWER


Share:
The Ahaadith refers to many wars to take place between the Muslims and Jews.
The Ahaadith do not specify at which stage of the ongoing wars Qiyaamat will
come.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
